name: Pixie Smack
description:
You smack fairies to make them drop fairy dust. Then you collect it in a basket. The more you gather, the more points you get. But beware, your time is limited.

Controls: Keyboard for basket (WASD, arrow keys) and mouse to smack

Developed during the 3rd Klagenfurt Game Jam by:
Frederik Florian Platter, Bernhard Nitsch, Natascha Rauscher, Alice Eberhard, Sara Wogatai, Fabian Schober, Kevin Herkt, Christian Hribernik.

Source Code: https://github.com/Kruemelkatze/PixieSmack
